title: Teacher
description: A person standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard) with the intention of teaching a class. Often shown holding a üìï Closed Book or a pointer.
apple_vendor_description: The teacher emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a kindly expression, often holding a book or pointer, rendered with smooth gradients and a gentle, approachable style. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and soft rounded edges give the figure a warm and professional appearance, symbolizing knowledge, education, and guidance. This universally understood symbol on Apple devices is perfect for acknowledging educators, discussing learning, or referencing academic pursuits.
